entry.title: Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 10 - Bride
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 10 - Bride20171021
All of the wedding scenes were very cute, especially Lois and
Clark. Quite adorable! Davis as Doomsday is really intense! I
find Lana so annoying.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 11 - Legion
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 11 - Legion20171021
It was weird to have people from the future come, but it was nice
to have Clark have a bit of a taste of his future role. I will be
annoyed if he becomes Superman in the last episode... give me at
least half a season.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 12 - Bulletproof
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 12 - Bulletproof20171021
This was kind of fun, both mostly a bit of a distraction given
the tenseness of the previous episode. I think in particular it
was strange that it didn't end in John Jones actually getting any
powers back... seems like a dumb reason to reintroduce him.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 13 - Power
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 13 - Power20171021
It's too bad that Allison Mack's episode wasn't that amazing. I
thought the plot was kind of meh, because of course Lana won't
survive this and it is a bad idea. Her training scenes were
pretty tough though, which was fun.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 7 - Identity
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 7 - Identity20171020
This was a pretty intense one. I really thought that Clark might
finally become Superman, but no. I think the craziest part was
how badly Chloe was lying to Jimmy... that was sad given the
recent one. It was pretty rough when Chloe killed that guy... you
could tell she regretted it.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 8 - Bloodline
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 8 - Bloodline20171020
I really liked this one. I think Kara is a great character and
it's sad that she is now off the show. I was surprised that Tess
hasn't seem to do anything with learning stuff from
Lois. Obviously Davis is Doomsday, ugh.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 9 - Abyss
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 9 - Abyss20171020
Ah man... it is even more clear that Davis is Doomsday; I hope
that Chloe isn't swayed from Jimmy... I like her being pure and
great. I can't believe that Chloe is now out of the
club... meaning that only Oliver is in on it now. Brainiac being
in control of the Fortress will be very bad. I'm surprised how
long he has lasted as a villain. It was so cute to see little
Chloe.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 1 - Odyssey
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 1 - Odyssey20171019
I was extremely surprised to see Lex and Kara gone this season. I
was sure that they were going to stick around, given how
fundamental they are to the show. The idea of Chloe with Brainiac
powers is really cool. I thought it was pretty dumb that Clark
got everything back so quickly... classic zero consequences. I
find Tess to be very curious.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 2 - Plastique
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 2 - Plastique20171019
This was a fun episode introducing what the dynamic will be like
now. I really enjoyed it, although I hope that there will be
slightly less "meteor powers" than past seasons.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 3 - Toxic
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 3 - Toxic20171019
It was really fun to see where Oliver came from and how Tess was
involved. Honestly though, I wasn't sure that we were supposed to
think the flashback was reality. Tess seems at once sympathetic
and very ruthless. I like it.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 4 - Instinct
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 4 - Instinct20171019
This was a fun episode. I think all hope of Clark and Chloe is
over sadly. I think that the growing connection between Clark and
Lois feels real and meaningful though, so I suppose that that is
nice.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 5 - Committed
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 5 - Committed20171019
This was a very believable way to get Lois and Clark closer
together. Although I was quite sad that Chloe/Clark is really
truly over. I assumed that the point of this episode was going to
be that Chloe and Jimmy were going to break up, but alas, no.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 6 - Prey
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 8 - Episode 6 - Prey20171019
This was a pretty creepy one. It is always interesting to see
which characters are missing in the episode. Right from his
introduction, it is clear we need to be suspicious of Davis, but
I wonder how long they will draw this out.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 7 - Episode 17 - Sleeper
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 7 - Episode 17 - Sleeper20171018
This was a kind of silly one, incorporating "spy" ideas, like the
many other "themed" episodes. The idea that Brainiac and Kara
went to Krypton is pretty cool.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 7 - Episode 18 - Apocalypse
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 7 - Episode 18 - Apocalypse20171018
This was a totally awesome episode. I loved the alternate reality
thing (a classic of comics) and all the little details in the
episode. I was annoyed that Krypton didn't make Clark queasy
though.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 7 - Episode 19 - Quest
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 7 - Episode 19 - Quest20171018
I found this one to be very annoying because I find it hard to
believe that an ancient Kryptonian ritual would involved
Kryptonite, etc. This was a really bad retcon.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 7 - Episode 20 - Arctic
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 7 - Episode 20 - Arctic20171018
I knew that Kara was acting weird, although I assumed that she
was being controlled as opposed to actually being Brainiac. The
end of this was much lower stakes than previous seasons, but it
was pretty cool. I hope that things will start getting intense in
future seasons. Thank goodness Lana is gone.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 7 - Episode 11 - Siren
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 7 - Episode 11 - Siren20171017
I was very surprised that no one mentioned that Grant was
dead. This was a weird episode for Oliver to come back in,
because it was kind of irrelevant to the greater picture.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 7 - Episode 12 - Fracture
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 7 - Episode 12 - Fracture20171017
This was a very cool episode, although I was quite surprised that
Clark was not more forthcoming with Kara afterwards. It was also
not explained how Lionel got the bracelet. The scenes with young
Lex were quite creepy.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville

entry.title: Smallville - Season 7 - Episode 13 - Hero
entry.content:
Smallville - Season 7 - Episode 13 - Hero20171017
Ugh, this episode reminded me of how much I dislike Pete. It was
so lame how little they gave Kara.
  • TV Shows
  • Smallville
